hera.wallet

Interface WalletApi

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Signer, TxSigner, WithPrincipal
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    WalletApiImpl

    @ApiAudience.Public
 @ApiStability.Unstable
public interface WalletApi
extends Signer
    A wallet api holding single identity. It interact with KeyStore. Has a signing role.
